name: CYANO
slogan: A curated selection of home & design items from the Mediterranean

jobs.title: Business Development/ Digital Marketing Intern [ Art & Design Industry ]
jobs.description:
This is an exciting and fun role where you will be able to express your creativity and personal input will be greatly appreciated. 

By joining CYANO you will have the unique opportunity to experience first-hand the growth of a sprouting startup and will get a glimpse of all steps required to set up a business.

No previous experience required - looking for a candidate with can-do attitude, motivation and ideally a passion for the arts, design and creative industry.REMOTELY based / FLEXIBLE Hours [ Initial commitment of 2-3 days a week ]

- Explore new opportunities for growthReach out to artists for partnerships
- Research new products for featuring on platform
- Source new products and contact suppliers for potential collaborations
- Assist in digital marketing with a strong focus on instagram marketing
- Responsible of press coverage and interviews


Preferred skills : 

- Greek language
- A passtion for the arts and design
